roleset.name: topographical twisting behavior of DNA helixes
roleset.note: SUPERCOIL-V, SUPERCOILING-N NOTES: Added by Julia for clearearth-biotexts.

role.descr: degree of supercoiling (This is a specific measurment, σ=ΔLk/Lk˳ where Lk is the sum of Wr and Tw)

example.name: supercoiling-n
example.text: Positive toroidal supercoiling should therefore result in the absence of a strong countering histone dimer:dimer interaction.

example.name: supercoiling-n
example.text: positive supercoiling with a writhe number of +1 must be generated in the DNA segments adjacent to the DNA–histone complex

example.name: supercoil-v: with arg6
example.src: google books: RNA Polymerases as Molecular Motors
example.text: Thus, this is the thermodynamic force experienced by [plasmid DNA]-1 supercoiled *trace*-1 to the x-axis intercept value.
